SELECT A.AUTH_NO, A.AUTH_NM, A.AUTH_EXPLANATION FROM TB_RESOURCE AS R INNER JOIN TB_RESOURCE_AUTH AS RA ON (RA.RESOURCE_NO = R.RESOURCE_NO) INNER JOIN TB_AUTH AS A ON (RA.AUTH_NO = A.AUTH_NO) WHERE R.RESOURCE_TYPE = #{type} AND R.RESOURCE_NO = #{resourceNo} ORDER BY A.AUTH_NO
